department: Public Prosecution Service of Canada - PPSC
description: Legistics procurements services to the Public Prosecution Service of Canada. They need a legal case management system.
full_summary:
**Legal Case Management System**

**Reference:** CB-5-6728845  
**Amendment:** 6  
**Solicitation Number:** 2023-A000202  

**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** December 15, 2023 2:00 p.m. (EST)  
**Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)  
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding  

**Background**
The Public Prosecution Service of Canada (PPSC) is seeking information from interested parties to provide a Legal Case Management System. This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather information that could assist the PPSC in the development of a future procurement process.

**Contract Requirements**
The PPSC is seeking a Legal Case Management System that meets the following requirements:

* UNSPSC Code: 43232616 (Legal management software)
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others.

**Contact Information**
For any queries or requests for information, please contact:
Luc Roussy
Phone: (613) 292-4785
Email: [luc.roussy@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca](mailto:luc.roussy@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca)
Address: 160 Elgin Street, Place Bell, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H8, Canada

**Document Attachments**
The tender notice and related documents can be accessed at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24035/2023-a000202_asd_rfi_lcms_en.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24035/2023-a000202_asd_rfi_lcms_en_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24035/2023-a000202_asd_dr_sgdj_fr.pdf

**Note**
The tender is already expired. The information provided in this RFI is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute a commitment by the PPSC to proceed with a procurement process. The PPSC reserves the right to modify or cancel the procurement process at its discretion. (400 words) I have rewritten the provided text in a more professional manner and made sure not to
